name: 红石遗迹 - Red Obsidian Remnant
publisher: Beijing New Era Network Technology Co., Ltd.
description: A Roguelike gameplay and action system combined dungeon game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 2.8GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX650 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
